title: The Collected + Annotated Carbon Grey (Image|2011->) Â®1.2
description:
" The Sisters Grey. Always Three. One for Strength. One for Grace. One for Wisdom.
      Until Twins were born, Mathilde and Giselle, and there was One more.
         A Fourth Sister. For Revolution. For Rebirth. "
             - "Carbon Grey", Volume 1, Issue 1

*************************************************************************************
* Changes against Revision 1.1 ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9045364" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9045364</a>  ):        *
*                                                                                   *
* Artbook:   Re-assembled into a series of notes for volume one, plus a sketchbook. *
*                                                                                   *
* IMHO, the design of the original release is extremely cumbersome, with all notes  *
* stuck into the front as a single block. This presentation is much nicer, the only *
* problem being a minor deterioration in continuity when notes refer to each other. *
*************************************************************************************

Contains:

SISTERS AT WAR - The first volume. Repackaged Lo-Res Digital-TPB with separate notes.

DAUGHTERS OF STONE - The second volume. Repackaged Hi-Res Digital-TPB. Each issue's last page(s) were revised for the TPB; the originals are again included separately.

SHORTS - Seven shorter (4 to 12 pages) stories from the "Origins" issues and TPBs.

SKETCHBOOK - ~30 pages of original artwork, sketches, et cetera. Digital Lo-Res.
